K10D0157_H0158:414b-33: rigs kyi bu; de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0157_H0158:414b-34: sems dpa' chen po skye bo phal po che'i nang
K10D0157_H0158:414b-35: na 'dug na / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba 'bar ro //
K10D0157_H0158:415a-1: 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji
K10D0157_H0158:415a-2: lta bur yul dang 'khor chen po 'byor bar gyur
K10D0157_H0158:415a-3: pa de lta de lta bur sems can dpag tu
K10D0157_H0158:415a-4: med pa yongs su smin par byed par rig par

K10D0157_H0158:415a-8: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rgyud kyi sgra dang /

K10D0157_H0158:415a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0157_H0158:415a-17: rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la mos pa rnams la mi
K10D0157_H0158:415a-18: 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos gang gi tshe pi
K10D0157_H0158:415a-19: wang gi sgra thos par byed cing sil snyan dang
K10D0157_H0158:415a-20: / glu dbyangs sbyor ba de na mi 'am ci dang /

K10D0157_H0158:415a-23: rab tu mgu ba chen po thob bo; ;de dag dga' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415a-25: rab tu mgu ba thob nas rgyud kyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415a-27: glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:415a-30: byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415a-31: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed par sbyor ba'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:415b-9: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415b-10: yang dag par spong ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415b-14: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415b-28: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415b-31: dngos po med pa'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:415b-32: byang chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415b-35: 'khor gsum yongs su sbyong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:415b-36: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:415b-37: chos thams cad la rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /

K10D0157_H0158:416a-2: rin chen 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-3: rin chen brtsegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-4: nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-5: dga' byed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /

K10D0157_H0158:416a-7: padma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /

K10D0157_H0158:416a-12: rnam par rgyal bar dbang byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-13: cher bsgyings ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-14: rnam pa la sems dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-15: sengge bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-16: nyi ma sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-17: mtha' yas 'khyil ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-18: rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-19: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-20: rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-21: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-22: rdo rje lte ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-23: sa 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-24: ri rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-25: ri rab rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-26: rin chen mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416a-27: sems la dbang byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-0: @416b sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-1: spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-2: zab mo sbed par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-3: spobs pa sna tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-4: bltar mi mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-5: chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-6: rnam par rol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-7: mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-8: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-9: gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-10: sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-11: lus thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-12: spyod pa thams cad la dbang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-13: shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-14: lag na sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-15: byang chub mngon sum snang byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-16: so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-17: yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 'byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:416b-19: de ltar rgyud kyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:416b-21: glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'di dang /
K10D0157_H0158:417a-2: sgra de dag gis sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0157_H0158:417a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
K10D0157_H0158:417a-5: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0157_H0158:417a-6: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i yon tan bsngags
K10D0157_H0158:417a-7: pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0157_H0158:417a-8: mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag par
K10D0157_H0158:417a-9: lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba'i bur ma grub nas
K10D0157_H0158:417a-10: de dag gis me tog gi phur ma de dag
K10D0157_H0158:417a-11: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la gtor to
K10D0157_H0158:417a-12: // de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos
K10D0157_H0158:417a-13: byin gyi rlabs ji lta bus me tog de dag
K10D0157_H0158:417a-14: lag pa g-yas par blangs te me tog gcig kyang
K10D0157_H0158:417a-15: sa la mi ltung bar de lta bu'i byin gyi
K10D0157_H0158:417a-16: rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas me tog blangs pa
K10D0157_H0158:417a-17: de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to
K10D0157_H0158:417a-18: // // de nas me tog de dag gtor ma
K10D0157_H0158:417a-19: thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de la
K10D0157_H0158:417a-20: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rin po
K10D0157_H0158:417a-21: che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur to //
K10D0157_H0158:417a-22: me tog rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig
K10D0157_H0158:417a-23: gi do shal bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
K10D0157_H0158:417a-25: me tog gi do shal 'phang ba re re las
K10D0157_H0158:417a-26: kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
K10D0157_H0158:417b-0: 'od zer @417b thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang padma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa /
K10D0157_H0158:417b-1: kha dog dag dang ldan pa /
K10D0157_H0158:417b-3: yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to //
K10D0157_H0158:417b-4: padma thams cad la'ang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i
K10D0157_H0158:417b-5: sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs
K10D0157_H0158:417b-6: pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs par kun
K10D0157_H0158:417b-7: tu snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
K10D0157_H0158:417b-8: dag thams cad kyis kyang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
K10D0157_H0158:417b-12: khyod kyis sems can mang po yongs su smin par byas so //
K10D0157_H0158:417b-13: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang
K10D0157_H0158:417b-14: yul las rnam par grol yang yul thams cad kyang
K10D0157_H0158:417b-15: ston / 'khor ba las grol yang bsam bzhin du srid par skye ba kun tu ston /
K10D0157_H0158:417b-16: mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon med pa thob kyang
K10D0157_H0158:417b-17: khams gsum na nye bar spyod pa 'di lta bu
K10D0157_H0158:417b-18: ni / byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yin te /
K10D0157_H0158:417b-20: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di snyam du sems te /
K10D0157_H0158:417b-21: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
K10D0157_H0158:417b-22: kyi dbu la rin po che'i gdugs gzhan dag byin
K10D0157_H0158:417b-24: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po de'i
K10D0157_H0158:417b-25: tshe rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
K10D0157_H0158:417b-26: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10D0157_H0158:417b-27: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po rin po che'i
K10D0157_H0158:418a-0: gdugs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par @418a
K10D0157_H0158:418a-1: *// zhugs ma thag tu de nas de bzhin gshegs
K10D0157_H0158:418a-2: pa thams cad kyi dbu'i thad drang gi steng na
K10D0157_H0158:418a-3: rin po che'i gdugs rnams gnas par kun tu snang
K10D0157_H0158:418a-4: *// ngo // 'khor der thams cad kyi lag pa
K10D0157_H0158:418a-5: g-yas pa nas kyang rin po che'i gdugs rnams byung
K10D0157_H0158:418a-6: *// ngo // bar gyur te / de dag gis
K10D0157_H0158:418a-7: rin po che'i gdugs de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
K10D0157_H0158:418a-8: 'das de dag la mngon par bkab bo //
K10D0157_H0158:418a-10: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di snyam du sems te /
K10D0157_H0158:418a-11: 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
K10D0157_H0158:418a-12: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K10D0157_H0158:418a-13: rgyas sh'akya thub pa nyan thos dang /
K10D0157_H0158:418a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bcas par bshos la spyan drangs te /
K10D0157_H0158:418a-15: 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
K10D0157_H0158:418a-16: par ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du bdag
K10D0157_H0158:418a-17: gi gnas su gshegs par gsol to //
K10D0157_H0158:418a-19: bdag gi gnas yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro; ;lha dang /
K10D0157_H0158:418a-26: lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs tshad med pa la phan btags par yang 'gyur ro //
K10D0157_H0158:418a-27: de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:418a-28: yongs su spyad par bya bar spro bar 'gyur te /
K10D0157_H0158:418a-29: de'i phyir de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang /
K10D0157_H0158:418b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10D0157_H0158:418b-3: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom
K10D0157_H0158:418b-4: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te
K10D0157_H0158:418b-5: thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
K10D0157_H0158:418b-7: bdag la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:418b-8: sems can tshad ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
K10D0157_H0158:418b-9: spel ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K10D0157_H0158:418b-10: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub
K10D0157_H0158:418b-12: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu ri
K10D0157_H0158:418b-13: spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bdag gi gnas
K10D0157_H0158:418b-14: su dgung bdun zhig bzhugs pa la bdag la gnang
K10D0157_H0158:418b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur dang /
K10D0157_H0158:418b-19: yongs su spyad par bgyi bar spro'o //
K10D0157_H0158:418b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong
K10D0157_H0158:418b-21: po la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0157_H0158:418b-22: dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa la
K10D0157_H0158:418b-23: zhag bdun ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la
K10D0157_H0158:418b-25: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom
K10D0157_H0158:418b-26: ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu
K10D0157_H0158:418b-27: la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba
K10D0157_H0158:418b-28: dang / yid bde ba skyes nas dpung dang bcas
K10D0157_H0158:418b-29: g-yog 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
K10D0157_H0158:418b-30: la mgo bos phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba
K10D0157_H0158:419a-2: rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byas nas bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0157_H0158:419a-3: mchod pa byas te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas
K10D0157_H0158:419a-4: song nas ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang ba
K10D0157_H0158:419a-5: la gnas so // de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal
K10D0157_H0158:419a-6: po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
K10D0157_H0158:419a-7: kyi phyir rang gi khyim rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
K10D0157_H0158:419a-8: te 'khor gyi khyams rgyar kun nas dpag tshad lnga
K10D0157_H0158:419a-9: la gnas so // brgya pa / bee d'urya sngon po dang /
K10D0157_H0158:419a-10: dzambu'i klung gi gser gyi padmas lags par brgyan pa /
K10D0157_H0158:419a-11: rin po che du mas rnam par spras pa byas so //
K10D0157_H0158:419a-12: 'khor gyi khyams der gdan khri rtsa ba rin po che las byas pa /
K10D0157_H0158:419a-13: lha'i ras brgya ston bting ba brgya stong phrag mang po bshams so //
K10D0157_H0158:419a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan sengge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa /
K10D0157_H0158:419a-15: rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa /
K10D0157_H0158:419a-16: rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba /
K10D0157_H0158:419a-20: snying po mchog gi bdug pas bdugs pa /
K10D0157_H0158:419a-22: dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa /
K10D0157_H0158:419a-23: lha'i me tog gtor ba bshams so //
K10D0157_H0158:419a-24: sengge'i khri de'i phyogs bzhir rin po che'i shing sna
K10D0157_H0158:419a-25: tshogs blta na sdug pa bzhi sprul te skye bo
K10D0157_H0158:419a-26: thams cad bsdus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
K10D0157_H0158:419a-27: smras so // au dum wa ra'i me tog ji bzhin du //
K10D0157_H0158:419a-28: sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya lam rnyed 'gyur ba //
K10D0157_H0158:419a-29: mi mchog de ni da ltar byung gyur gyi //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-0: skyob la @419b gus dang bcas pas mchod pa gyis //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-1: nga rgyal dag dang rgyags dang g-yo spongs la //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-2: phrag dog ser sna de bzhin sgyu rnams dang //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-3: rgod pa thams cad yongs su spong byos la //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-4: ston la gus dang bcas pas mchod pa gyis //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-5: spos ngad ldang ba 'di na lha yul ba'i //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-6: me tog khyad par 'phags pa ji snyed pa //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-7: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas su //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-8: skyes bu khyu mchog la ni mchod pa gyis //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-9: sems can mchog la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-10: dri zhim yid 'ong khyad par 'phags pa'i dri //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-11: dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsandan gyis //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-12: spos kyi ngad ldang 'di la bdug pa gyis //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-13: glu dbyangs sil snyan rnam mang yid 'ong ba //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-14: mi 'am ci dag rtag rtsen gar byed pa //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-15: ldan par byos la dga' zhing dang ba yis //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-16: rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa rab tu gyis //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-17: mtshungs pa med pa mthong ba rnyed dka' ba //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-18: de bzhin gshegs la lha yi gdugs rnams dang //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-19: ba dan dag dang rgyal mtshan chos gos dang //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-20: bla re mang po yid 'ong gzung bar byos //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-21: sangs rgyas mchod pas bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-22: brgya byin dang ni 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-23: tshangs pa dag dang dbang byed dbang phyug dang //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-24: lha dang mi yi bdag po chen por 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-25: mi mchog mchod pas gzugs dang kha dog dang //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-26: grags dang brjod dang 'khor dang longs spyod dang //
K10D0157_H0158:419b-27: de bzhin dbang phyug dang ni snyan tshig dang //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-2: gang dag 'dir ni lha dang de bzhin du //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-3: mi rnams kyi ni 'dus byas bde ba dang //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-4: bde ba bde bas tshim par 'dod pa rnams //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-5: 'jig rten mgon po de la mchod pa gyis //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-6: rang rgyal byang chub de bzhin nyan thos dang //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-7: de ltar dam pa mchog gi theg pa dang //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-8: bdud kyi dpung rnams rab 'joms gang 'dod pas //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-9: sems can mchog de la ni mchod pa gyis //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-10: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rang
K10D0157_H0158:420a-11: gi g-yog 'khor thams cad la go bar byas te
K10D0157_H0158:420a-14: byug pa bsngogs nas ro brgya ba'i zhal zas bshams
K10D0157_H0158:420a-15: te ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang gi lho
K10D0157_H0158:420a-16: phyogs kyi ngos la 'dug nas sil snyan dang /
K10D0157_H0158:420a-17: glu dbyangs blangs te rgyud kyi sgra dang /
K10D0157_H0158:420a-18: glu'i sgra dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di
K10D0157_H0158:420a-19: dag gi dbyangs las tshigs su bcad de bcom ldan
K10D0157_H0158:420a-21: phan pa mdzad cing bde mdzad dga' mdzad bcom ldan 'das //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-22: zhal yang rab 'dzum zla ba'i ngos ltar dri mi mnga'//
K10D0157_H0158:420a-23: skyes mchog dge sbyong dam pa lha dang mis mchod pa //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-24: bde bar gshegs khyod 'dir gshegs pa yi dus 'di lags //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-25: stobs bcu rnams kyi stobs mnga' pha rol dpung 'joms pa //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-26: gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms shing 'gro la phan pa mdzad //
K10D0157_H0158:420a-27: 'jo dang rnyog pa rnams dang dri ma 'thab spangs pa //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-0: phan pa @420b mdzad pa khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-1: sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdul sbyangs the tshom rnam par gtor //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-2: dran dang blo gros blo yangs mos rtogs blo gros ldan //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-3: 'gro rgyal rtag tu 'gro ba 'gro med 'gro ba spangs //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-4: phan pa mdzad cing dga' mdzad rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-5: nyi ma zla ba nor bu glog rnams mdzes pa'i 'do //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-6: brgya byin tshangs pa srid gsum lha tshogs 'od 'phrog cing //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-7: 'od mdzad dpal stug thub khyod 'od ni phan bgyid pas //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-8: 'od 'di bsal nas rgyal ba'i 'od ni lhag ge yi //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-9: khyod kyi lha skad klu skad mi ci'i glu sgra yis //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-10: yang dang yang du 'bar ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-11: skad mchog yangs pa tshangs pa rnams kyi sgra skad kyis //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-12: nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar bgyid pas 'bar ma lags //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-13: sman pa gang dag phyogs bcur rgyu yang de dag gis //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-14: gang du'ang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid mi nus //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-15: sman pa'i rgyal po bla med gang tshe gsung brjod pa //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-16: de tshe nyon mongs kun zhi bde ba thams cad sbyin //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-17: shin tu ngo mtshar 'od dang stobs mchog mtshungs med stobs //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-18: gsung ni skyon bral 'khrul pa mi mnga' dgra 'dul ba //
K10D0157_H0158:420b-19: rdul med rab rib bdag gi mun pa shin tu
K10D0157_H0158:420b-20: bcom; ;dgra bral phan mdzad khyed kyi dus lags 'dir
K10D0157_H0158:420b-21: gshegs gsol // sbyin dang dul dang legs spyod mi mnyam mtshungs dang mnyam //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-2: bzod dang dul dang shin tu dge la nges pa'i thugs //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-3: dga' gsung dgra rnams kyi ni dga' spong gshegs su gsol //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-4: dbang po stobs dang lam dgyes bsam gtan mngon mkhyen rol //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-5: dran dang blo gros rtogs dang mos la gnas pa'i thugs //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-6: 'od ni rab tu lhag ge shin tu dgyes pa'i thugs //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-7: yon tan mnga' ba khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-8: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms bsgoms pa'i thugs //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-9: skyon gyi mun pa bcom zhing bag la nyal dang bral //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-10: tshangs pa'i lam ni rab bslabs rgyal ba'i lam la gnas //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-11: dga' mdzad bde bar gshegs pa dus lags gshegs su gsol //
K10D0157_H0158:421a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi 'am ci'i rgyal
K10D0157_H0158:421a-13: po sdong pos dus bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
K10D0157_H0158:421a-14: gsan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun la bka' stsal
K10D0157_H0158:421a-16: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos dus bskul gyi /
K10D0157_H0158:421a-18: chos gos thogs la zhag bdun gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang skyong yang skos shig /
K10D0157_H0158:421a-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan 'di snyam du sems te /
K10D0157_H0158:421a-20: 'di ltar bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa
K10D0157_H0158:421a-21: 'di lta bu sprul la khang pa brtsegs pa der
K10D0157_H0158:421a-22: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos
K10D0157_H0158:421a-23: kyi tshogs dang bcas pa bzhugs te rin po che
K10D0157_H0158:421b-0: bkod pa'i sengge'i @421b khri la bzhugs pa'i khang pa
K10D0157_H0158:421b-1: brtsegs pa bdag gis lag pa g-yas par blangs te
K10D0157_H0158:421b-2: nam mkha'i ngos las ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad
K10D0157_H0158:421b-3: ldang du bkur bar byin gyis brlab bo //
K10D0157_H0158:421b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan de'i
K10D0157_H0158:421b-5: tshe 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
K10D0157_H0158:421b-6: zhugs te / ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par
K10D0157_H0158:421b-7: zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
K10D0157_H0158:421b-8: khang pa brtsegs pa tshad dpag tshad bcu pa /
K10D0157_H0158:421b-14: shin tu rnam par phye ba byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:421b-15: khang pa brtsegs pa der stobs dang ldan pa'i padma bkod pa'i khri rnams kyang byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:421b-16: khang pa brtsegs pa der bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan
K10D0157_H0158:421b-17: rin po che'i padma bkod pa'i sengge'i khri 'phang du
K10D0157_H0158:421b-18: mi bdun yod pa byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:421b-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:421b-20: sengge'i khri bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0157_H0158:421b-21: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10D0157_H0158:421b-22: nyan thos chen po 'di dag dang thabs cig tu
K10D0157_H0158:421b-23: khang pa brtsegs pa sengge'i khri bshams pa 'dir bzhugs
K10D0157_H0158:421b-24: su gsol / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khang pa
K10D0157_H0158:421b-25: brtsegs pa 'di sug pa g-yas pas blangs te ri'i
K10D0157_H0158:421b-26: rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du 'tshal nas gzhag
K10D0157_H0158:422a-0: su gsol / par bgyi'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lha'i @422a *//
K10D0157_H0158:422a-1: cod pan la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems
K10D0157_H0158:422a-2: dpa' dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang thabs
K10D0157_H0158:422a-3: cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa der ji ltar khri
K10D0157_H0158:422a-4: bshams pa de dag la bzhugs so //
K10D0157_H0158:422a-5: de ras byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis
K10D0157_H0158:422a-6: khang pa brtsegs pa de lags mthil g-yas par blangs
K10D0157_H0158:422a-7: te steng gi nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis song
K10D0157_H0158:422a-8: ngo // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang /
K10D0157_H0158:422a-9: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub
K10D0157_H0158:422a-10: sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
K10D0157_H0158:422a-11: 'phrul 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs
K10D0157_H0158:422a-12: shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:422a-13: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0157_H0158:422a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod
K10D0157_H0158:422a-15: pan la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog dang
K10D0157_H0158:422a-19: byug pa thams cad thogs te sil snyan dang /
K10D0157_H0158:422a-20: pheg rdob pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa
K10D0157_H0158:422a-21: brtsegs pa na bzhugs shing nam mkha'i ngos las gshegs
K10D0157_H0158:422a-22: pa la mchod pa byas te ri'i rgyal po spos
K10D0157_H0158:422a-23: kyi ngad ldang du phyin to //
K10D0157_H0158:422a-24: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das
K10D0157_H0158:422a-25: khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs shing nam mkha'i ngos
K10D0157_H0158:422a-28: dri za brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bskor te me tog dang /
K10D0157_H0158:422b-1: byug pa thams cad thogs nas sil snyan dang /
K10D0157_H0158:422b-3: glu dbyangs len pa'i bkod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:422b-4: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dpung dang bcas /
K10D0157_H0158:422b-5: 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
K10D0157_H0158:422b-6: mgo bos phyag btsal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me
K10D0157_H0158:422b-13: glu dbyangs len pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so //
K10D0157_H0158:422b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dus la bab par
K10D0157_H0158:422b-15: mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen
K10D0157_H0158:422b-19: de ma yin pa gzhan lha'i bu rnams dang thabs
K10D0157_H0158:422b-20: cig tu mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'khor
K10D0157_H0158:422b-21: gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs te
K10D0157_H0158:422b-22: rang gi sengge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs
K10D0157_H0158:422b-23: so // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
K10D0157_H0158:422b-24: nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad so so ci rigs par 'khod do //
K10D0157_H0158:422b-25: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos brgya byin dang /
K10D0157_H0158:422b-29: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la smras pa /
K10D0157_H0158:422b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod gsol gyi /
K10D0157_H0158:422b-32: khyed thams cad 'dus la chur spyon /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-1: rgyal po sdong po slas dang bcas /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-3: rang gi skye bo dang bcas /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-5: g-yog dang bcas te rang rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-6: bca' ba gya nom pa mang po ro dang ldan pa /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-7: ro brgya ba'i zhal zas sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-10: 'khor la brims nas ci bde bar bstabs te tshim par byas so //
K10D0157_H0158:423a-11: tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed
K10D0157_H0158:423a-12: bzhag ste phyag bcabs par rig nas dpung dang bcas
K10D0157_H0158:423a-13: / g-yog dang bcas te chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom
K10D0157_H0158:423a-14: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji ltar bdag la 'os
K10D0157_H0158:423a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-17: skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston to //
K10D0157_H0158:423a-18: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-20: rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K10D0157_H0158:423a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam ni /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-24: rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems
K10D0157_H0158:423a-25: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
K10D0157_H0158:423a-26: phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no //
K10D0157_H0158:423a-27: rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
K10D0157_H0158:423a-30: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na byang
K10D0157_H0158:423b-0: chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin @423b pa
K10D0157_H0158:423b-2: theg pa chung du spangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-3: slong ba la zhe sdang ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-4: len pa rnams la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed de sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-5: len pa rnams la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-6: nang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-7: kun tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis dga' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-9: mchog tu dga' ba thob nas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-10: lag pa brkyang ste grol bas gtong ba rnam par
K10D0157_H0158:423b-11: gtong ba la dga' bas sbyin pa de sbyin pa
K10D0157_H0158:423b-12: dang / rgya chen po la mos te zhum pa
K10D0157_H0158:423b-13: med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang
K10D0157_H0158:423b-14: dang / / snod thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-15: rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-16: lan la re ba med pa'i blos sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i blos sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngos te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-19: gdung ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-20: bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro bas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-21: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-22: chos 'dzin par gyur cig snyam ste sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:423b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dang mthun par gyur cig snyam ste sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:424a-0: bdag bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcod @424a *//
K10D0157_H0158:424a-1: par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:424a-2: bdag byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:424a-3: bdag skyes bu dam pa'i las byed par gyur cig ces sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:424a-4: bdag yi dvags kyi lam rnam par spong bar gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:424a-5: bdag gi bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i
K10D0157_H0158:424a-6: rgyur gyur cig ces sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang
K10D0157_H0158:424a-7: / bdag gis longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'i sgrub

K10D0157_H0158:424a-11: bdag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dkan par ma gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:424a-12: bdag la sems can thams cad dga' ba'i mig dang
K10D0157_H0158:424a-13: ldan par gyur cig ces te sbyin par de sbyin
K10D0157_H0158:424a-14: pa dang / bdag gi sbyin pa des bla na
K10D0157_H0158:424a-15: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub
K10D0157_H0158:424a-16: par gyur cig ces sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang
K10D0157_H0158:424a-17: pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba
K10D0157_H0158:424a-18: phun sum tshogs pa gzhan rnams kyi rjes su slob
K10D0157_H0158:424a-19: par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa
K10D0157_H0158:424a-20: pa dang / / dang / bdag mtshan dang dpe
K10D0157_H0158:424a-21: byad bzang po bsags pa yongs su 'dzin par gyur
K10D0157_H0158:424a-22: cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:424a-23: bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:424a-24: bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du
K10D0157_H0158:424b-0: gyur cig ces @424b te sbyin pa sbyin pa ste
K10D0157_H0158:424b-2: rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis
K10D0157_H0158:424b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
K10D0157_H0158:424b-4: pa yongs su dag pa yin no //
K10D0157_H0158:424b-6: rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems
K10D0157_H0158:424b-7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
K10D0157_H0158:424b-8: tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no //
K10D0157_H0158:424b-9: sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
K10D0157_H0158:424b-13: gti mgu dang bral bas lus yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /

K10D0157_H0158:438b-8: mngon par bkab ste 'di skad ces kyang gsol to;
K10D0157_H0158:438b-9: // ;bcom ldan 'das // gang gi slad du bdag
K10D0157_H0158:438b-10: cag gis nyan pa'i rna ba 'di lta bu thob
K10D0157_H0158:438b-12: bdag cag gi ched du byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:438b-15: glu dbyangs 'di dag las the tshom 'dri ba'i sgra 'di lta bu byung ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:438b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa
K10D0157_H0158:438b-17: de dag thams cad kyi lan btab pas 'khor 'di'i
K10D0157_H0158:438b-18: dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:438b-19: bdag cag kyang chos snang ba dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to //
K10D0157_H0158:438b-21: sil snyan de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags /
K10D0157_H0158:438b-22: su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis na //
K10D0157_H0158:438b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis lan 'debs par gyur /
K10D0157_H0158:438b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0157_H0158:438b-27: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs su blta'o //
K10D0157_H0158:438b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu byung na /
K10D0157_H0158:439a-0: sil snyan las chos kyi sgra ci'i phyir mi @439a *//
K10D0157_H0158:439a-3: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni /
K10D0157_H0158:439a-5: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis gsol pa /
K10D0157_H0158:439a-7: sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
K10D0157_H0158:439a-8: rlabs bsam gyi mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig
K10D0157_H0158:439a-10: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas
K10D0157_H0158:439a-11: mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mu tig
K10D0157_H0158:439a-12: kha dog sna tshogs kyi do shal thogs nas bcom
K10D0157_H0158:439a-13: ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa
K10D0157_H0158:439a-14: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
K10D0157_H0158:439a-15: phyag bcal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i mu tig gi
K10D0157_H0158:439a-16: do shal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
K10D0157_H0158:439a-17: dang / par bkab bo // mu tig gi do
K10D0157_H0158:439a-18: shal de dag phul ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0157_H0158:439a-19: mthus de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi
K10D0157_H0158:439a-20: drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la mu tig
K10D0157_H0158:439a-21: gi do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri
K10D0157_H0158:439a-23: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang gru bzhi lham pa /
K10D0157_H0158:439a-26: ngos shin tu rnam par phye ba sha stag go /
K10D0157_H0158:439a-27: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag na rin po ches
K10D0157_H0158:439a-28: spras pa'i khri rtsa ba'ang rin po che las byas
K10D0157_H0158:439a-29: pa / lha'i ras bcos ma'i zung du ma bkram pa dag byung bar gyur to //

K10D0157_H0158:439b-0: sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa @439b
K10D0157_H0158:439b-1: gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun
K10D0157_H0158:439b-2: tu snang ngo // de nas mi 'am ci mo
K10D0157_H0158:439b-3: brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho
K10D0157_H0158:439b-4: 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu
K10D0157_H0158:439b-5: ste yid rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:439b-6: yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag pa nas
K10D0157_H0158:439b-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0157_H0158:439b-9: de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dga' zhing
K10D0157_H0158:439b-10: mchog tu dga' ste dang pa thob nas thams cad
K10D0157_H0158:439b-12: dbyangs gcig tu tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad
K10D0157_H0158:439b-13: pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
K10D0157_H0158:439b-14: bstod do // bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung ba //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-15: don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-16: don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab bslab pa //

K10D0157_H0158:439b-18: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug tha ba 'jig /
K10D0157_H0158:439b-19: dgon par bzhugs dgyes bsnyengs ba mi mnga' ba //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-20: rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa po //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-21: bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-22: spyan sngar dri bral nyon mongs mi mnga' ba //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-23: sa yi dbang po pha rol dgra 'joms pa //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-24: padmo lta bur srid gsum mi gos pa //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-25: bde gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-26: 'gro ba'i nang na mig dang 'drar spyod cing //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-27: nyi zla 'di yi 'od ni spa bkong ba //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-28: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su rgyal por skyes //
K10D0157_H0158:439b-29: 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-0: @440a *// ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi chags shing //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-1: mgon dang dpung dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-2: khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pa ga la zhig /

K10D0157_H0158:440a-5: 'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-6: chags sred 'khri shing dra bgrol mdzad pa //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-7: bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-8: dul ba thugs ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag /
K10D0157_H0158:440a-9: nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab bzhugs shing //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-10: 'gro la zang zing mi mnga' sbyin stsol pa //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-11: sbyin pa'i gnas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-12: smra mchog dam pa mtshan gyi 'od 'phros pa //

K10D0157_H0158:440a-14: 'jam zhing snum la snyan pa'i gsung gsung ba //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-15: srid pa gsum las 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-16: mi mchog gdung bas gdungs pa mi mnga' ba //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-17: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshags //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-18: 'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'i gru mdzad pa //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-19: bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-20: bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la ston mdzad pa //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-21: chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes drug /
K10D0157_H0158:440a-22: ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'grel //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-23: 'gro drug nye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440a-24: gser gyi kha dog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-0: zhi gnas dbang po dul la @440b phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-1: ston gyi zla lta'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-2: mi mchog yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-3: nyon mongs bsregs shing bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-4: skye rgu 'di dag bsgral dka' chu bzhi sgrol;/
K10D0157_H0158:440b-5: bsgoms shing dbang po thul ba'i bcom ldan 'das //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-6: khyod la skyabs su mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-7: thub pas sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab stsal //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-8: bslangs na dbang po dgyes par rab 'gyur ba //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-9: pha rol dag la sbyin pa mchog stsol ba //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-10: gtong dpa' bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-11: sems can nga rgyal rgyags khengs gti mug pa //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-12: rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'gal bgyid rnams //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-13: 'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam mchog la //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-14: rnam par 'dren pa chen po khyod kyis bkod //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-15: phung po rang bzhin gyis ni stong mkhyen nas //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-16: las dang nyon mongs zil gyis mnan te bzhugs //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-17: 'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi som nyi gcod //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-18: bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-19: bden pa'i chos la dgyes shing mnyam par bzhag /
K10D0157_H0158:440b-20: chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-21: bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog /
K10D0157_H0158:440b-22: bcom ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-23: 'chos pa mi mnga' g-yo sgyu rnams dang bral //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-24: bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa'i stobs po che //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-25: mi mchog lam dang lam la lags la mkhas //
K10D0157_H0158:440b-26: rlung dmar lta bur ci la'ang chags mi mnga'//
K10D0157_H0158:440b-27: gzir bar gyur gsal pha rol shin tu gnas //

K10D0157_H0158:441a-6: gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis brten //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-7: de slad mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-8: skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-9: tshe rabs bye ba bsam mi khyab pa dgongs //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis //

K10D0157_H0158:441a-12: 'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud //

K10D0157_H0158:441a-15: bcom ldan bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-16: gzugs rnams la ni dbang gi pha rol phyin //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-17: zang zing mi mnga' chos kyi sbyin pa stsol //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-18: thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab brdungs pa //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-19: chos rje bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-20: sh'akya'i rigs rus rgyal po'i las byung ba //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-21: dbang po zhi zhing thugs kyang rab tu zhi //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-22: ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnam gzigs pa //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-23: bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-24: bdud rnams dpung dang bcas pas rno pa yi //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-25: ral gri thogs nas byang chub drung lhags kyang //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-26: khyod kyi ba spu tsam yang ma g-yos te //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-27: bcom ldan ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:441a-28: mi yi dam pa bzod pa'i pha rol phyin //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-0: sku rnams kun la nongs pa bgyis @441b kyang bzod //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-1: yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'chi bas dpa'//
K10D0157_H0158:441b-2: bzod gsung bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-3: mthu brnyes bde bar gshegs pa mi g-yo ba //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-4: gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa bsnyengs mi mnga'//
K10D0157_H0158:441b-5: khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-6: chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-7: 'dus bgyis nyam chung snying po med bar mkhyen //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-8: skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma lags sel //

K10D0157_H0158:441b-10: ye shes pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-11: sems can long ba sdug bsngal mgon med pa //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-12: de dag khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum tshim bgyis //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-13: khyod ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa //
K10D0157_H0158:441b-14: bcom ldan mgon gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

K10D0157_H0158:441b-17: srid pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa //

K10D0157_H0158:441b-20: mtshungs med byang chub la ni chags mi mnga'//

K10D0157_H0158:442a-0: ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil @442a *//
K10D0157_H0158:442a-2: ljags ni padma 'dab ma brgya lta bu //

K10D0157_H0158:442a-7: byang chub mchog la srog chags mos par mdzad //
K10D0157_H0158:442a-8: nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs ba; ;ser sna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'//
K10D0157_H0158:442a-9: mi yi dam pa gser ltar dpal stug pa //

K10D0157_H0158:442a-23: phung po gsog ste nyam chung snying po med //

K10D0157_H0158:452b-10: nan tan dang ldan pa ste /
K10D0157_H0158:452b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba sha stag go /
K10D0157_H0158:452b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam /
K10D0157_H0158:452b-14: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang /
K10D0157_H0158:452b-16: dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:452b-17: pha rol rgol ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0157_H0158:452b-18: sems can de dag thams cad ni /
K10D0157_H0158:452b-19: zab mo'i spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ro //
K10D0157_H0158:452b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming du btags pa tsam dang /
K10D0157_H0158:452b-21: 'du shes tsam ma gtogs par lha dang /
K10D0157_H0158:452b-22: mi zhes tha dad du bya ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0157_H0158:452b-23: sems can de dag thams cad ni; yongs su spyad pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0157_H0158:452b-25: bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba
K10D0157_H0158:452b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0157_H0158:453a-0: rdzogs pa'i @453a *// sangs rgyas de'ang lha dang /
K10D0157_H0158:453a-1: mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:453a-2: skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir bar gyi
K10D0157_H0158:453a-3: bskal pa bcu tham par bzhugs par 'gyur ro; ;bcom
K10D0157_H0158:453a-4: ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de
K10D0157_H0158:453a-5: bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya
K10D0157_H0158:453a-6: ngan las 'das par bzhed pa de'i tshe byang chub
K10D0157_H0158:453a-7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba
K10D0157_H0158:453a-8: 'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0157_H0158:453a-9: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
K10D0157_H0158:453a-11: bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
K10D0157_H0158:453a-12: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K10D0157_H0158:453a-13: rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10D0157_H0158:453a-16: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10D0157_H0158:453a-17: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10D0157_H0158:453a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro //
K10D0157_H0158:453a-19: zhes byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes
K10D0157_H0158:453a-20: bya ba lung bstan nas mya ngan las 'da' bar
K10D0157_H0158:453a-22: bar gyi bskal pa de'ang sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /
K10D0157_H0158:453a-24: dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te; bar gyi bskal pa de ni /
K10D0157_H0158:453a-25: dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do //
K10D0157_H0158:453a-26: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom
K10D0157_H0158:453a-27: ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas dga' zhing
K10D0157_H0158:453b-0: mgu ste yid @453b rangs shing rab tu dga' nas
K10D0157_H0158:453b-1: dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te /
K10D0157_H0158:453b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:453b-3: mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi
K10D0157_H0158:453b-4: bar snang la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags
K10D0157_H0158:453b-5: te thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dad pa rgya
K10D0157_H0158:453b-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10D0157_H0158:453b-8: rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-9: chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-10: dri ma med de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-11: rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-12: de phyir de dag thub sras thu bor 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-13: rmi lam bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-14: thams cad med de gzung med gsog dang gsob //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-15: chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-16: 'dus byas dag pa skyo bar 'gyur ba med //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-17: la las sgyu ma'i rta dang glang chen dang //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-18: shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon mthong ba //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-19: dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-20: phung po 'di dag sgyu 'dra snying po med; ;gzugs kyi rang bzhin dbu ba brdos pa bzhin //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-21: tshor ba 'di ni chu yi chu bur 'dra //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-22: 'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gzungs //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-23: 'dus byas thams cad chu shing snying po med //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-24: srid gsum 'di ni sems yid rnam par shes //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-25: rgyal bas de bzhin sgyu 'dra gsog tu gsungs //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-26: gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas ni //
K10D0157_H0158:453b-27: 'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-0: @454a *// khams bzhi po ni chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-1: skye mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-2: chos 'di gsog dang gsob ltar rnam shes pa //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-3: de dag rgyal pa'i chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-4: rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-5: de bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-6: rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-7: stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag /
K10D0157_H0158:454a-8: bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-9: de ltar shes rab chags med ma spros par //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-10: gang gi 'jug pa de 'drar gyur pa de //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-11: pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab tu phyin;/
K10D0157_H0158:454a-12: bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-13: nam mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag /
K10D0157_H0158:454a-14: zhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yi //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-15: lam 'di tshangs pa'i lam ste rtag tu zhi //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-16: bsdu ba bzhi po khyad par 'phags pa 'di //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-17: rnam par 'dren pas rjes su gzung phyir gsungs //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-18: 'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-19: de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-20: sems can 'di dag bdag med sems can med //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-21: srog dang gso ba gang zag mi rnyed do //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-22: dbang po drug 'di stong ste rab zhi bar //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-23: gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-24: sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-25: de ni gang du'ang bdag med rlom sems med //
K10D0157_H0158:454a-26: gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-0: @454b sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal ldan //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-1: chos 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-2: gang du'ang mi 'ong nam yang 'gror mi 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-3: chos dbyings 'di yi gnas pa rig nas ni //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-4: rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-5: gang na'ang yod pa'am med pa med mod kyi //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-6: rgyu la brten nas chos rnams 'byung bas na //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-7: mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-8: sems kyi 'khri shing de ltar shes par bya //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-9: rlung ni nam mkhar mi chags rgyu ba bzhin //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-10: gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-11: sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-12: nyon mongs gzugs med gsog par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-13: lus ni rtsig pa rtsva dang lo ma 'dra //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-14: blun pa rje med rngo shing ngan pa ltar //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-15: de yis snga ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-16: lus kyi chos la gnas par mi byed do //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-17: tshig ni rtag tu gzung med rlung dang 'dra //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-18: ri dang brag gi brag ca lta bu ste //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-19: de 'drar sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-20: sgra rnams kun la 'dod pa'i chags pa med; ;bdag ni nam mkha'i ngos gnas mi ltung ste //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-21: mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-22: chos 'di nam mkha' 'dra bar bsgoms nas ni //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-23: de ltar sems can sems can med mtshungs gnas //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-24: bskal pa brgya phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni //
K10D0157_H0158:454b-25: ji ltar nam mkha' nam yang sngon ma tshig /
K10D0157_H0158:454b-26: chos rnams thams cad nam mkhar 'drar shes pa //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-2: ri dang ri bar khor khor yug ri //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-3: de bzhin ri dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-4: nam mkha'i ngos kyis phye bar rig nas de //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-5: rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro /
K10D0157_H0158:455a-6: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-7: khams bzhi 'di dag nam mkha'i ngos mnyam par //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-8: dpa' bo tshul 'di khong du chud pa dag /
K10D0157_H0158:455a-9: mkha' las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro /
K10D0157_H0158:455a-10: srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi bag /
K10D0157_H0158:455a-11: bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ci yod pa //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-12: de yi mtha' ma bskal pa brgyar brjod kyang //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-13: sngon gyi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-14: rang byung ba ni mtshan mchog ma yin yang //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-15: sems kyi chos kyis gzugs kyis rab tu phye //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-16: sems dang yid ni mtshungs pa dben par gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-17: rgyal ba thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-18: sngon gyi srid par byang chub spyad spyod cing //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-19: dge ba brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-20: byang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa; ;grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstan 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-21: chos rnams kun ni rang yul yongs dag ste //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-22: mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-23: mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes pa //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-24: yon tan ldan pa de dag lung bstan 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-25: bdag ni gzugs min tshor min 'du shes min //
K10D0157_H0158:455a-26: sems pa ma yin rnam par shes med kyang //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-0: byang chub khong du chud @455b pas bdag lung bstan //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-1: phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-2: bzod pa gang zhig gzod ma nas zhi yi //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-3: skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dra min la //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-4: mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod pa na //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-5: mi dbang 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-6: chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-7: bdag ni bdag med stong pa'i rang bzhin te //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-8: stong pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-9: byang chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang bzhin no //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-10: zad par bya phyir zad pa shes mi nus //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-11: mi zad pa ni zad pas zad mi 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-12: zad pa'i sgo yis chos rnams kun ma skyes //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-13: bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ston to //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-14: mtshan med gnas 'jug pa yi gnas med de //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-15: yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las grol //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-16: ma byas byed du ma bcug byung ba min //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-17: de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung bstan //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-18: gal te bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-19: chos lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ba yin //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-20: sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor ma yin //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-21: chos sbyor khyad par 'phags 'di mtshungs shing mnyam //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-22: khyed cag thams cad sa yi steng na 'khod //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-23: bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-24: sa dang nam mkha' mnyam par shes nas ni //
K10D0157_H0158:455b-25: srid pa gsum na chags med ye shes 'jug /
K10D0157_H0158:455b-26: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos tshigs
K10D0157_H0158:455b-27: su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas steng gi bar
K10D0157_H0158:455b-28: snang las babs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan
K10D0157_H0158:456a-1: btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0157_H0158:456a-4: bdag gi ched du byung ngo //
K10D0157_H0158:456a-5: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0157_H0158:456a-6: bcom ldan 'das; bdag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par ma bgyis te /
K10D0157_H0158:456a-7: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma
K10D0157_H0158:456a-8: bslus pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa
K10D0157_H0158:456a-9: thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bla na
K10D0157_H0158:456a-10: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0157_H0158:456a-11: lung bstan to // de nas 'khor de'i nang na
K10D0157_H0158:456a-12: byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di lta bu'i sems
K10D0157_H0158:456a-13: lung bstan to // bskyed de / mi 'am ci'i
K10D0157_H0158:456a-14: rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K10D0157_H0158:456a-15: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las
K10D0157_H0158:456a-16: dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0157_H0158:456a-17: pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed snyam mo //
K10D0157_H0158:456a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis
K10D0157_H0158:456a-19: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam
K10D0157_H0158:456a-20: par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0157_H0158:456a-23: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs
K10D0157_H0158:456a-24: pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de
K10D0157_H0158:456a-25: bzhin gshegs de'i mtshan ci lags /
K10D0157_H0158:456a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0157_H0158:456a-27: rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-1: bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i
K10D0157_H0158:456b-2: dus na rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal
K10D0157_H0158:456b-3: pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya
K10D0157_H0158:456b-4: bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
K10D0157_H0158:456b-5: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su
K10D0157_H0158:456b-6: ldan pa / bde bar gshegs pa /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-8: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-9: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa; sangs rgyas bcom
K10D0157_H0158:456b-10: ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig
K10D0157_H0158:456b-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
K10D0157_H0158:456b-14: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0157_H0158:456b-15: sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems
K10D0157_H0158:456b-17: bye ba phrag drug cur gyur te /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-18: thams cad kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-19: bzod pa rab tu thob pa; bla na med pa
K10D0157_H0158:456b-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
K10D0157_H0158:456b-23: lo bye ba phrag drug cu thob par gyur to //
K10D0157_H0158:456b-24: dge ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang beed'urya las grub pa /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-25: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-26: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-27: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang /
K10D0157_H0158:456b-31: btung ba bsam pa tsam gyis 'byor ba'o //
K10D0157_H0158:456b-32: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po
K10D0157_H0158:456b-33: ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan rnam par bzhag pa
K10D0157_H0158:457a-1: de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi pa dbang ba'i
K10D0157_H0158:457a-2: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya
K10D0157_H0158:457a-3: ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig
K10D0157_H0158:457a-4: byung ste / de'i slas ni; stong phrag bzhi bcu yod do //
K10D0157_H0158:457a-9: yan lag mchog gi gzugs can /
K10D0157_H0158:457a-10: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go /
K10D0157_H0158:457a-12: rgyal po sa 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de dang /
K10D0157_H0158:457a-13: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu la
K10D0157_H0158:457a-14: lo bye ba tham par yid du 'ong ba'i chos

K10D0157_H0158:462b-3: de nas sengge'i khri de la bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs /

K10D0157_H0158:462b-7: de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rdzu
K10D0157_H0158:462b-8: 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shing rta de lag pa g-yas
K10D0157_H0158:462b-9: pas blangs te shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng
K10D0157_H0158:462b-10: gi bar snang la 'phags nas de nas mi 'am
K10D0157_H0158:462b-11: ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad
K10D0157_H0158:462b-12: dang / bu brgyad stong po de dag dang /
K10D0157_H0158:462b-15: lto 'phye chen po brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K10D0157_H0158:462b-16: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po nyid kyang rin
K10D0157_H0158:462b-17: po che'i thag pa thogs nas shing rta la btags
K10D0157_H0158:462b-18: te nam mkha' las drangs so //
K10D0157_H0158:462b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing /
K10D0157_H0158:462b-20: nam mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa la mi 'am ci
K10D0157_H0158:462b-21: mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bo de dag gis sil
K10D0157_H0158:462b-22: snyan dang / glu dbyangs blangs nas mchod pa byed
K10D0157_H0158:462b-23: de mdun du dong shing bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
K10D0157_H0158:462b-24: su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do
K10D0157_H0158:462b-25: snyan dang / // mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po //
K10D0157_H0158:462b-26: gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag /
K10D0157_H0158:462b-27: sil snyan rnams ni rab tu dkrol bgyid cing //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-2: mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-3: gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-4: bden pa'i yon tan la ni rtag gnas pa //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-5: yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-6: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-7: g-yas g-yon na yang rnam par mthong ma myong //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-8: ji ltar ri rab brtan zhing mi g-yo ba //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-9: de ltar khyed kyi sku ni dbal gyis mdzes //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-10: 'dren pa khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-11: chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-12: nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mi mnga'//
K10D0157_H0158:463a-13: bcom ldan nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-14: lha dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-15: brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lha //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-16: nyi ma zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i 'od //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-17: khyed kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-18: shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-19: sems can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-20: 'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-21: 'jig rten grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-22: bdud bzhi po yi skyon rnams bsal ba bo //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-23: bden pa bzhi la sgom zhing dbyod mdzad pa //
K10D0157_H0158:463a-24: rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi stobs kyis bsnyengs mi mnga'//
K10D0157_H0158:463a-25: sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs te gshegs pa mdzes //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-0: bskal pa brgyar yang skyo ba mi mnga' @463b zhing; ;rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par bzhag /
K10D0157_H0158:463b-1: legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-2: khyod ni tshig dang skad la gnas ma lags //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-3: khyod kyi gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu snyan //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-4: zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par mchi //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-5: sgra ni sems can gang gis thos gyur pa //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-6: de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-7: sems can kha lo sgyur pa spu gcig tu //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-8: stong gsum rgya mtsho'i cha ba rnams zhugs gyur kyang //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-9: sems can rags pa rnams la'ang mi gnod la //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-10: rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yong mi gda'//
K10D0157_H0158:463b-11: stong gsum gyi ni ri bo ri rab dag /
K10D0157_H0158:463b-12: phyag gcig gi ni mthil du bzhag nas su //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-13: zhing mang bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad kyang //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-14: khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum ma mchis //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-15: khyod ni bskal pa brgya phrag bsam yas nas //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-16: brtul zhugs dka' thub tshul khrims yon tan dang //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-17: sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-18: brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bslabs //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-19: sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bsnyen bkur mdzad //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-20: de dag rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-21: thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-22: khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'//
K10D0157_H0158:463b-23: rim gror ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-24: rim gro bgyis pas mtho bar 'gyur ma lags //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-25: dog sa lta bur snyoms shing mi g-yo ste //
K10D0157_H0158:463b-26: 'jig rten chos gnas mi gos padma bzhin //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-1: stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-2: chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-3: dbu ba brdos 'dra rmi lam glog 'dra dang //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-4: smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen; ;ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma mchis //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-5: gdod nas stong zhing mi g-yo rjes ma mchis //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-6: nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-7: dngos po bas bar dngos po ma mchis 'dra //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-8: las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams las //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-9: byung ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-10: tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pas na //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-11: de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-12: gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-13: de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-14: de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-15: srog chags de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-16: bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-17: kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas su //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-18: byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-19: gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog /
K10D0157_H0158:464a-20: nam mkha' la ni dpag tu nus kyang gda'//
K10D0157_H0158:464a-21: rgya mtsho'i chab ni bas bgyir nus kyang gda'//
K10D0157_H0158:464a-22: nyi zla mkha' las sar ni ltung gda' yi //
K10D0157_H0158:464a-23: sangs rgyas yon tan pas bar 'gyur mi gda'//
K10D0157_H0158:464a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te
K10D0157_H0158:464a-25: nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs shing
K10D0157_H0158:464b-0: / gser gyi kha @464b dog lta bur sku las
K10D0157_H0158:464b-1: 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
K10D0157_H0158:464b-2: rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
K10D0157_H0158:464b-4: 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang /
K10D0157_H0158:464b-5: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'ang rab tu khyab par gyur to //
K10D0157_H0158:464b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang /
K10D0157_H0158:464b-7: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der gshegs so //
K10D0157_H0158:464b-8: de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang /
K10D0157_H0158:464b-12: khyim bdag tu bcas pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:464b-15: dge bsnyen dang; dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe me tog dang /
K10D0157_H0158:464b-22: ba dan thogs te bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir
K10D0157_H0158:464b-23: rings par rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
K10D0157_H0158:464b-24: chen po nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i
K10D0157_H0158:464b-25: ri la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
K10D0157_H0158:464b-26: ngo // sdong po'i slas rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed do //
K10D0157_H0158:464b-27: mi 'am ci mo'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra
K10D0157_H0158:464b-28: des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad du
K10D0157_H0158:464b-30: de ltar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dbung dang bcas /
K10D0157_H0158:464b-31: 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom
K10D0157_H0158:464b-32: ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer te bya rgod
K10D0157_H0158:464b-33: kyi phung po'i ri la bzhag go /
K10D0157_H0158:465a-1: bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs nas rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K10D0157_H0158:465a-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0157_H0158:465a-3: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10D0157_H0158:465a-4: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang shing rta de
K10D0157_H0158:465a-5: las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
K10D0157_H0158:465a-6: bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas
K10D0157_H0158:465a-7: bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te rang rang
K10D0157_H0158:465a-11: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang
K10D0157_H0158:465a-12: shing rta de las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0157_H0158:465a-13: zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu
K10D0157_H0158:465a-14: 'khod do // de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang /
K10D0157_H0158:465a-18: grong rdal ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:465a-22: dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang /
K10D0157_H0158:465a-31: ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom
K10D0157_H0158:465a-32: ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0157_H0158:465a-33: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan
K10D0157_H0158:465b-0: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas phyogs gcig tu @465b 'khod do //
K10D0157_H0158:465b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0157_H0158:465b-3: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po g-yog 'khor dang
K10D0157_H0158:465b-4: bcas pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te shing
K10D0157_H0158:465b-5: rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas drangs pa'i
K10D0157_H0158:465b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
K10D0157_H0158:465b-7: sdong po 'khor dang bcas pas ci zhig thob par
K10D0157_H0158:465b-8: 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0157_H0158:465b-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po slas dang bcas /
K10D0157_H0158:465b-11: g-yog dang bcas pas 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed
K10D0157_H0158:465b-12: nas de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying
K10D0157_H0158:465b-13: po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa
K10D0157_H0158:465b-14: las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur /
K10D0157_H0158:465b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur /
K10D0157_H0158:465b-18: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur /
K10D0157_H0158:465b-19: tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur /
K10D0157_H0158:465b-21: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par 'gyur /
K10D0157_H0158:465b-22: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0157_H0158:465b-23: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi 'am ci'i
K10D0157_H0158:465b-24: bdag po sdong po la 'di skad ces smras so
K10D0157_H0158:466a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod @466a *//
K10D0157_H0158:466a-1: kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyi /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-2: khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shas shig kho bos kyang thob par 'dod do //
K10D0157_H0158:466a-3: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos smras pa /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-6: sems can thams cad la dbul lo //
K10D0157_H0158:466a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-10: gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag gang yang med do //
K10D0157_H0158:466a-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-13: ser sna can ma yin te /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-14: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi bskyed do //
K10D0157_H0158:466a-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi bgyid /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thams
K10D0157_H0158:466a-19: cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de'ang sems can
K10D0157_H0158:466a-23: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-24: sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-25: sems can la sbyor ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-26: sems can gyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur ro; ;rgyal po chen po /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-27: khyod kyis gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466a-28: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rnyed de /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-0: de gnyis las khyod kyis dam pa'i @466b chos thos nas des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-1: gti mug gi ling rtog chen pos mtshams med pa'i
K10D0157_H0158:466b-2: 'gyod pa byung ba'i sems bsal nas khyod kyis chos
K10D0157_H0158:466b-3: la chos kyi snang ba chen po thob ste /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-4: chos kyi snang ba des khyod da ltar sgrib pa
K10D0157_H0158:466b-5: med pa thob cing gnas pas khyod kyis kyang rnyed
K10D0157_H0158:466b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par byas te ci nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-10: yi ge 'bru gcig thos pa'ang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-11: chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-13: yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o //
K10D0157_H0158:466b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0157_H0158:466b-17: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-18: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0157_H0158:466b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-23: sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-26: byang chub sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10D0157_H0158:466b-27: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod bsam pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-0: byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i snod @467a *//
K10D0157_H0158:467a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-3: mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-4: lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-5: don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-6: longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-7: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-8: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-10: sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-11: dogs pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-12: sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-13: dbul zhing nyam thag pa thams cad bskyab pa'i snod snying rje dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-14: chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-16: khong khro ba spang ba'i snod btang snyoms dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-19: mi ltos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-20: don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467a-21: bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467b-0: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu @467b ba'i dngos po dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467b-1: chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467b-2: thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang /
K10D0157_H0158:467b-3: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad pa'i snod spong stsa pa dang /
